text: The World Class Schools Task Force shall conduct its duties under this part in consultation with:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 31-2853.32.

DC CODE ยง 38-1803.12

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The District of Columbia Goals Panel;

Officials of the District of Columbia public schools who have been identified by the Superintendent as having responsibilities relevant to this part, including the Deputy Superintendent for Curriculum;
The District of Columbia community, with particular attention given to educators, and parent and business organizations; and
Any other persons or groups that the task force deems appropriate.

chapter.text: District of Columbia School Reform (Public Charter Schools).

subchapter.text: World Class School Task Force, Core Curriculum, Content Standards, Assessments, and Promotion Gates.

part.text: World Class School Task Force, Core Curriculum, Content Standards, Assessments.
